feed.title: freeCodeCamp.org
feed.description: Learn to code. Build projects. Earn certifications. Since 2015, 40,000 graduates have gotten jobs at tech companies including Google, Apple, Amazon, and Microsoft.

items.title: How I Used Regression Analysis to Analyze Life Expectancy with Scikit-Learn and Statsmodels
items.description: Regression analysis (using Python) to predict life expectancy of people in a country using characteristics like GDP, birth rate and environmental performance index.
items.content: Regression analysis (using Python) to predict life expectancy of people in a country using characteristics like GDP, birth rate and environmental performance index.

items.title: How to set up and track YouTube Channel performance with Google Analytics
items.description: Managing a YouTube channel is a lot of work. It includes content experimentation which can make or break your SEO effectiveness for your channel. How can we track our channelâ€™s performance to see what works?

items.title: Learn React Basics in 10 Minutes
items.description: This article aims to provide a beginner-friendly introduction to React, what it is and why we need it. The overall goal is to gain an intuitive understanding of what React is all about so that you get comfortable with the basics.
items.content: This article aims to provide a beginner-friendly introduction to React, what it is and why we need it. The overall goal is to gain an intuitive understanding of what React is all about so that you get comfortable with the basics.

items.title: Three Things to Consider Before Deploying Your First Full Stack App
items.description: Building a full stack app is no small endeavor, and deploying it comes with its own host of things to consider. I'm a tabletop game developer, and recently deployed a simple roleplaying game tracker that uses the M-E-V-N stack (you can follow my tutorial to create your own app here)
